ingredients.item: ½ x 175g pack Waitrose Baby Corn, cut into 2cm diagonals
260g pack Waitrose Cod & Salmon Fish Mix

instructions.step: Cook the tagliatelle in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, then drain, reserving some of the liquid.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the garlic, corn and fish mix for 3-4 minutes until just cooked. Stir in the harissa and season well.
Add in the tagliatelle and a little of the reserved cooking liquid. Sprinkle over the parsley and serve.
